nodes.text: Oka-wood was a type of timber that could be used in the construction of furniture. The cantina of the Mon Calamari Pok in the city of Myrra on the planet Akiva had a bar made of oka-wood shortly before the Rebellion on Akiva.
Oka-wood first appeared in the novel Aftermath, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released in 2015.
